meanings.definition: A dog of a breed with a distinctive ridge of hair along its back.
meanings.sent1: The ridgeback happily wagged its tail.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful ridgeback at the park today.
meanings.sent3: The ridgeback tried to hide its bone in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The ridgeback's loyalty was as strong as its ridge.
meanings.sent5: Children laughed as the ridgeback chased a butterfly.

meanings.definition: Having a ridge along the back.
meanings.sent1: The mountain range looked ridgeback in the distance.
meanings.sent2: She admired the ridgeback pattern on the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a ridgeback design on top.
meanings.sent4: The old tree had a ridgeback bark texture.
meanings.sent5: The road had a ridgeback appearance after the earthquake.
